N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 857.1 - Background and intent

State Regulations
(a) Regulation of
compulsive gambling (also known as "gambling disorder" or "problem gambling" as
such terms are defined herein) was transferred by statute in 2005 from the

Office of Mental Health (OMH) to OASAS. (b) OASAS is directed to define treatment, develop access to prevention, treatment and recovery services, develop minimum
standards for treatment, establish core competencies for treatment
professionals and service providers, and educate providers of other addictive
disorder treatment and mental health services. Notes
